APC Hosting, a premiere web hosting company in Singapore since 2003 and awarded Singapore Business Superbrands 2014, offers reliable Windows Reseller Hosting services in Singapore at affordable prices. Our servers and networks are continuously monitored 24/7 in the event of emergency.

Windows Beginner Hosting Plan
• 15,000 MB Disk Space
• 100 GB Monthly Bandwidth
• Plesk Panel / Reseller Interface
• Unlimited Domains
• Unlimited FTP Accounts
• Unlimited Email Accounts
• ASP.Net/PHP/MySQL/Perl/CGI/Tomcat
• Application Vault (Script Installer for Plesk)
• 99.9% Network Uptime Guaranteed
• DDoS Protection Included
• 30-Day Money Back Guarantee

Yearly Fee: S$250/year

Windows Web Hosting are also available from S$70/year and you may visit our website here: http://www.apc.sg/windows-web-hosting.php.

For more information and to view more windows shared hosting plans, please visit the links below. You may also contact us at 6715-1550 or email sales@apc.sg.
